title: Edwardian Display Style Discounted
content:
Greater Albion Typefounders is pleased to announce that three of our more popular and established Edwardian display families are being offered for a short time at a 40% discount on MyFonts.com:

[Absinette:](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015184620/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/absinette/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015184620im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Absinette_Sale_Poster_4460.png)

[Bonning:](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015184620/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/bonning/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015184620im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bonning_Sale_Poster_5984.png)

[Helenium:](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015184620/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/helenium/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015184620im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Helenium%20_Sale_Poster_5965.png)
author: Rasendyll

comments.content: How long does the sale run for?
